title: Savoy Cafe and Deli
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Beer/Wine, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Family operated restaurant, deli, bakery, and bar with a European market feel. Natural wood atmosphere with flowers, fountains, and dog friendly patio. Hot and cold food deli cases includes some vegan and gluten free dishes. Organic juices and beverages as well as local organic espresso. In-house-made bakery items using agave and maple include gluten free and dairy-free desserts. Soy, almond, rice milk available.
